text:
In the year 2020, India had exported millions of HCQ tablets to USA in the amidst of spikes of COVID-19. But now the same US has denied India's request to lift the ban on exporting the raw materials for the manufacture of vaccine. ವಿಶ್ವದ ದೊಡ್ಡಣ್ಣನ ಸಣ್ಣತನ!
#US #COVID19 #vaccine https://t.co/1zs4psA3Qh
